The Disney characters party with good friends and good tunes in this fun design.

Disney Good Vibes

Come party with the Disney crew and spread some GOOD VIBES. Mickey is spinning records while the Disney crew gets their groove on. These designs are printed on our new oversized fit T-shirt for a relaxed feel.

©Disney

items.longDescription:
This “Monsters, Inc.” print features a mosaic created by Adam Lister. The adults’ version featuring Sully and the kids’ version featuring Mike are cleverly designed so that the text joins up across both shirts when worn together as a parent-and-child matching outfit.

PIXAR ART

Pixar Animation Studios has created such beloved films as “Toy Story” and “Monsters, Inc.,” which continue to be loved by people all over the world. UNIQLO has invited artists who love Pixar films to reinterpret the famous characters in their own distinct style.

Adam Lister
Adam Lister lives and works in Beacon, New York. Lister is a visual artist whose work consists of geometric interpretations of iconic imagery and pop culture references. Lister breaks down classic images to their most elemental forms by combining the deconstructed and minimal aesthetic of pixelated graphics with the transparency of watercolor paint and the flatness of acrylic paint.

©Disney/Pixar
©Disney
items.name: Pixar Art Short Sleeve UT
items.shortDescription: Contemporary artists have created unique, never-before-seen designs of Pixar characters, now available on UT!
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.longDescription:
This “Toy Story” print features a mosaic created by Adam Lister. The characters and the iconic wallpaper from Andy’s room in the first “Toy Story” movie are reinterpreted as geometric pixel art.

PIXAR ART

Pixar Animation Studios has created such beloved films as “Toy Story” and “Monsters, Inc.,” which continue to be loved by people all over the world. UNIQLO has invited artists who love Pixar films to reinterpret the famous characters in their own distinct style.

items.longDescription:
This “Monsters, Inc.” print features a hand-drawn graphic created by Kazuma Mikami. A small graphic on the front shows the door connecting the monster world to the human world, while the lovable characters Mike and Sully are depicted on the back.

PIXAR ART

Pixar Animation Studios has created such beloved films as “Toy Story” and “Monsters, Inc.,” which continue to be loved by people all over the world. UNIQLO has invited artists who love Pixar films to reinterpret the famous characters in their own distinct style.

Kazuma Mikami
Based in Tokyo. His style is characterized by the use of both digital and analog techniques. He works mainly for magazines, advertisements, and music videos as an illustrator. Recently, he has been involved in a wide range of activities as an artist, including the creation of ceramic works using VR.

©Disney/Pixar
©Disney

items.longDescription:
L.A. EATS

Los Angeles in the USA is the birthplace of food culture. These L.A. hotspot eateries now make their own T-shirts and are loved by locals as well as visitors. This collection features three establishments that are trending in the food community: Pizzanista!, Burger She Wrote, and Katsu Sando.

items.longDescription:
My Hero Academia

The TV anime "My Hero Academia" is a story of growth, battles, and friendship in a world of superpowered Quirk. This collection is a symbol of the work, with contrasting graphics depicting the heroes who protect people and society, and the villains—criminals who use their Quirks for evil.

© K. Horikoshi / Shueisha, My Hero Academia Project

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The design is based on a Nishikie of "Kabuki Juhachiban", with "Oshimodoshi" printed on the front and the rest of the plays of Kabuki Juhachiban on the back.
Kabuki Juhachiban" is a series of 18 plays established by Danjuro Ichikawa VII from the family arts that have been well-received since his ancestors. Nishikie are multicolor ukiyoe prints, and many works related to Kabuki, such as yakusha-e (portrayals of actors) depicting Kabuki actors on stage, were produced and gained popularity. They are equivalent to today's bromides.

Ichikawa Danjūrō XIII, Hakuen | Shochiku Kabuki

In the fall of 2022, the KABUKI Traditional name "Ichikawa Danjuro", which has been in existence since the Edo period, will be revived for the first time in nine years. Ichikawa Danjuro XIII, Hakuen was born. To commemorate the succession, T-shirts were designed with the themes of "costumes," "kumadori," and "nishiki-e," which are symbols of KABUKI. This piece of t-shirts conveys the appeal of KABUKI, a traditional Japanese culture.

©In Association with Shochiku
items.name: Shochiku Kabuki Short Sleeve UT
items.shortDescription: A special piece of t-shirts commemorating the succession to the name of Ichikawa Danjuro, the grand feudal lord of Naritaya.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The graphic motif is based on the symbolic purple Hachimaki, red and white coloring, and crest from the costume of "Sukeroku," one of the "Kabuki Juhachiban.
Sukeroku's chic appearance fascinated people and he was called "the most handsome man in Edo".
Kabuki costumes are an important part of the beauty of the Kabuki stage. Their colors, dyeing, weaving, and embroidery are filled with the skills of many craftsmen and the ingenuity of their predecessors.

Ichikawa Danjūrō XIII, Hakuen | Shochiku Kabuki

In the fall of 2022, the KABUKI Traditional name "Ichikawa Danjuro", which has been in existence since the Edo period, will be revived for the first time in nine years. Ichikawa Danjuro XIII, Hakuen was born. To commemorate the succession, T-shirts were designed with the themes of "costumes," "kumadori," and "nishiki-e," which are symbols of KABUKI. This piece of t-shirts conveys the appeal of KABUKI, a traditional Japanese culture.

©In Association with Shochiku
items.name: Shochiku Kabuki Short Sleeve UT
items.shortDescription: A special piece of t-shirts commemorating the succession to the name of Ichikawa Danjuro, the grand feudal lord of Naritaya.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The front of this shirt is printed with the oshiguma of Ichikawa Danjuro XIII, Hakuen, a KABUKI actor himself.
Kumadori is a unique KABUKI makeup technique. It also has the role of visually conveying the character of the role to the audience through the colors and types of makeup. Kumadori is also said to represent the ridges of muscles and blood vessels. Oshiguma is a copy of the kumadori applied by the actor by pressing it against paper or cloth.

Ichikawa Danjūrō XIII, Hakuen | Shochiku Kabuki

In the fall of 2022, the KABUKI Traditional name "Ichikawa Danjuro", which has been in existence since the Edo period, will be revived for the first time in nine years. Ichikawa Danjuro XIII, Hakuen was born. To commemorate the succession, T-shirts were designed with the themes of "costumes," "kumadori," and "nishiki-e," which are symbols of KABUKI. This piece of t-shirts conveys the appeal of KABUKI, a traditional Japanese culture.

©In Association with Shochiku

items.longDescription:
Pokémon Masters EX

“Pokémon Masters EX” is a game that takes you on an adventurous journey where you can experience the bond between Pokémon and Trainers. Trainers develop an affectionate and trusting relationship with their precious Pokémon in the journey. This collection represents that special bond between　Pokémon and Trainers featured in the Pokémon series.

©2023 Pokémon.
©1995-2023 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
©DeNA Co., Ltd.
